Package by.epam.store.model.service

Interface OrderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderServiceImpl
public interface OrderService
The interface for operations with the orders

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Optional<Order> addProductToBasket​(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long orderBasketId, java.lang.String productId)
    Adds a product to the basket

    Cancels order

    Changes the quantity of product in the order

    Makes an order

    Processes an order
    boolean removeProductFromOrder​(java.lang.Long orderId, java.lang.String productId)
    Removes a product from an order

  • Method Details

    • addProductToBasket

      java.util.Optional<Order> addProductToBasket​(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long orderBasketId, java.lang.String productId) throws ServiceException
      Adds a product to the basket
      Parameters:
      userId - Long user id
      orderBasketId - Long order id with basket status
      productId - String product id
      Returns:
      Optional of Order received from database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • changeQuantityOfProductInOrder

      boolean changeQuantityOfProductInOrder​(java.lang.Long orderId, java.lang.String productId, java.lang.String quantityOfProduct) throws ServiceException
      Changes the quantity of product in the order
      Parameters:
      orderId - Long order id
      productId - String product id
      quantityOfProduct - String the quantity of product
      Returns:
      boolean true if the quantity of product has been changed, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • removeProductFromOrder

      boolean removeProductFromOrder​(java.lang.Long orderId, java.lang.String productId) throws ServiceException
      Removes a product from an order
      Parameters:
      orderId - Long order id
      productId - String product id
      Returns:
      boolean true if the product has been removed, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • checkout

      boolean checkout​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> orderInfo) throws ServiceException, InvalidDataException
      Makes an order
      Parameters:
      orderInfo - Map of String and String the names of the Order fields and its values
      Returns:
      boolean true if the order has been placed, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs
      InvalidDataException - if order info is invalid

    • cancelOrder

      boolean cancelOrder​(java.lang.String orderId, java.lang.String orderStatus, UserRole role) throws ServiceException
      Cancels order
      Parameters:
      orderId - String order id
      orderStatus - String current order status
      role - UserRole the role of the user who cancels the order
      Returns:
      boolean true if the order has been canceled, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • processOrder

      boolean processOrder​(java.lang.String orderId, java.lang.String orderStatus) throws ServiceException
      Processes an order
      Parameters:
      orderId - String order id
      orderStatus - String current order status
      Returns:
      boolean true if the order has been processed, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeOrderBasket

      java.util.Optional<Order> takeOrderBasket​(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long orderBasketId) throws ServiceException
      Gives an order with the status basket
      Parameters:
      userId - Long user id
      orderBasketId - Long order basket id
      Returns:
      Optional of Order received from database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeOrderById

      java.util.Optional<Order> takeOrderById​(java.lang.String orderId) throws ServiceException
      Gives an order by id
      Parameters:
      orderId - String order id
      Returns:
      Optional of Order received from database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeOrdersByLogin

      java.util.List<Order> takeOrdersByLogin​(java.lang.String login) throws ServiceException
      Gives orders by user login
      Parameters:
      login - String user login
      Returns:
      List of Order received from database if orders are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeOrdersByStatus

      java.util.List<Order> takeOrdersByStatus​(java.lang.String orderStatus) throws ServiceException
      Gives orders by status
      Parameters:
      orderStatus - String order status
      Returns:
      List of Order received from database if orders are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs
